featured.text: The famous film director Ang Lee recalls his father’s disappointment with him when he was young.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於表示某種情感或狀態的詞，通常用於口語中。
definition.en_def: A term used to express a certain emotion or state, often in informal speech.
definition.example: She felt an ang of disappointment when she didn't get the job.
